game.name: Evil Of Fate
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Evil Of Fate is a horror-thriller game. Features first- and third-person weapon mechanics Experience this fascinating and frightening atmosphere with up to 4 friends. Fight in a universe where a witch has imprisoned people.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Evil Of Fate is a horror-thriller game. Features first- and third-person weapon mechanics Experience this fascinating and frightening atmosphere with up to 4 friends. Fight in a universe where a witch has imprisoned people.
game.developers: Efekan Şişeci, Canıbir Gökşen, Kerem Karadağ
